Title: The Boy’s Journey 1
Story Text:

He stepped into the stars and never returned.

Q4: What happens near the end of story 1?
A4: He stepped into the stars and never returned.
Q5: What is the overall theme of story 1?
A5: He stepped into the stars and never returned.
